name: Project HOME
description: Project HOME provides housing, opportunities for employment, medical care, and education to enable adults, children, and families to break the cycle of homelessness and poverty.

name: Philabundance
description: Philabundance is the Delaware Valleyâ€™s largest food bank, providing food to people experiencing hunger in nine counties in Pennsylvania and Southern New Jersey.

name: Jefferson Health
description: Jefferson Health offers comprehensive healthcare services across multiple locations in Philadelphia.

name: Bethesda Project
description: Bethesda Project offers emergency shelter, transitional housing, and permanent supportive housing for individuals experiencing homelessness in Philadelphia.

name: Share Food Program
description: Share Food Program is a non-profit organization that leads the fight against food insecurity in the Philadelphia region by providing food to partners and directly to individuals and families.

name: City of Philadelphia Health Centers
description: The Philadelphia Department of Public Health operates health centers throughout the city offering primary care, dental, and behavioral health services.
